author: Special Correspondent
text: A short-film contest was organised here on Wednesday as part of Systematic Voter Education and Electoral Participation (SVEEP) initiative of the Election Commission. Students from professional and polytechnic colleges participated in the contest and screened their short-films. Collector T. Karikalan, who inaugurated the contest, underlined the need for exercising the franchise without fail. He explained the arrangements being made by the district administration as part of the model code of conduct for ensuring free and fair polls. He said response to the contest was overwhelming from the students of Karaikal Polytechnic College, Vinayaka Mission Medical College, National Institute of Technology – Puducherry at Karaikal, Perunthalaivar Kamarajar Polytechnic College and Amamrnath College of Education. He said that three films would be selected and the top-ranking film would be screened on the local television.
title: Short-film contest
